Description:
Relaxed & Convenient Living
This neatly maintained home offers comfortable living for the first home buyers, young families or an opportunity to secure the perfect investment property. The instant comfort and appeal of this home, complimented by its superb location, will ensure this residence is a talking point amongst buyers.
Situated in the highly sought-after Kensignton Estate and set on approximately 509m2, this well-maintained family home has so much to offer. Comprising 3 spacious bedrooms, plus a study. The master bedroom offers a private ensuite and ample robe space, while remaining bedrooms utilize the spacious central bathroom and separate toilet. The convenient layout of this floorplan incorporates the open plan kitchen, dining and living zone at the hub of the home. The functional kitchen includes dishwasher, large stainless-steel gas cooktop & oven, and an abundance of storage and bench space. Furthermore, the two separate living zones provide extra space for the whole family to relax and enjoy.
Completing this ideal property is the enormous, undercover outdoor entertaining area. As far as alfresco dining goes, this is certainly impressive, perfect for enjoying family BBQs. The rear yard also offers a lush lawn and abundance of yard space is waiting to be enjoyed by all, as well as the low maintenance border garden being both pretty and practical.
Added features include gas ducted heating throughout, split system A/C and double garage.
Within close proximity to Leopold Primary school, Gateway Plaza, walking tracks, parks and bike trails. Public transport, parks, and playgrounds only a stones throw away. Not to mention only moments from some of the best attractions the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. This home simply caters to everyone! Sure to please both investment buyers and those looking for a new family residence. This property is every bit as good as it looks from the street. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity!

Description:
Smart Effortless Living
This low maintenance brick and tile home in a quiet court location is spacious, well planned and sunny. With a floor plan that will be appreciated by families or downsizers alike, it features two separate and comfortable living zones. Choose from the open plan kitchen, living and dining area, which enjoys a northerly aspect and easy indoor/outdoor flow. Or alternatively make your self at home in the generous lounge, which is the ideal parents retreat or quiet zone. The adjacent master bedroom includes a generous walk-in robe and an en-suite. Two additional bedrooms are located towards the rear of the home and both have built in robes. Designed to make everyday life and entertaining effortless, the centrally located kitchen features ample storage and workspace, gas cooking and a garden outlook. A family sized bathroom with a separate bath and shower, a conveniently positioned laundry, and a double garage with roller door access to the rear garden are also included. Polished timber flooring adds character and the ducted heating throughout is a welcome bonus.
A covered patio provides the perfect spot for outdoor entertaining, and there is room for back yard games on the sunny lawn. The 576m² (approx) grounds are fenced and include easy care established gardens and a handy shed. There is plentiful off street parking too.
Situated in a popular and peaceful enclave with shops, school and parks close by; this home will be appreciated by anyone looking for smart uncomplicated living and a home for all seasons.

Description:
Unsurpassed Views - 2 Titles, Expressions of Interest Close 27th August @ 5pm
Situated on the cliff, with unsurpassed panoramic vistas of the bay, this magnificent 5145m² (approx.) allotment has to be one of the best parcels Victoria has to offer. Currently on two titles with the bayside title reaching the high water mark, you can enjoy private beach access and have the option of selling the second block off separately or enjoying the space and privacy it provides.
The existing home is grand in proportions and could benefit from an update or simply start again with your dream home in this amazing location.
Downstairs comprises a large living area with open fire place and reverse cycle air conditioning and two bedrooms all with extraordinary views, bathroom with bath and separate shower, kitchen and dining room, huge laundry plus internal access from the double garage. Upstairs features a further four bedrooms, updated bathroom and a further kitchen and living area with a large balcony to take in the serenity.
With an additional single garage and carport plus shedding this is both the complete package and a potential blank canvas. Embrace the beauty of the surrounding Bellarine with boat launching facilities, golf and bowling club and The Dell bayside parkland and beach walkways all just a stroll away.
With so much to offer and so much further potential, an inspection here is simply a must.

Description:
All Year Entertainer
The Feel:
Custom built to the highest levels of craftsmanship, this refined 5 bedroom, 2 bathroom, dual living family home was created with exacting specifications to maximise the northerly aspect, ensuring a comfortable, entertainers lifestyle. Ideally positioned between the city & the coast, & set on a substantial 1860sqm block with 2 x DLUGs & extensive shedding, this architectural property enjoys a private position with 8-person spa & AIS endorsed heated training pool, delivering on quality, elegance & practicality.
The Facts:
-Custom built 5BR home on 1860sqm (approx.) with wow factor on arrival
-Fully renovated with only the highest of standards & practicalities in mind
-Slate floors throughout, with new eco-weave carpet to the bedrooms
-Master bedroom with his & hers BIRs, luxury en suite, timber vanity & oversized double shower
-4 additional zoned minor BRs with BIRs (2 with built-in desks)
-Family bathroom features floor to ceiling tiles, freestanding egg bath, shower, timber vanity with stone basins
-Dedicated kids retreat/theatre room/study area to complement their sleeping quarters
-Luxury kitchen with showstopper farmhouse kitchen sink, waterfall stone benchtop, Hamptons style cabinetry & recycled timber overhead cupboards
-Premium quality appliances including freestanding 900mm Smeg oven + wall oven, gas hob, wine fridge, dishwasher, double fridge cavity & walk-in pantry
-Family study area in full view of parents in kitchen & meals area
-Spacious dining & living room both flow directly onto outdoor BBQ area
-Open fire in main living area, S/S climate control system
-Built-in timber shelves, cathedral ceilings & gallery wall space
-Alfresco undercover entertainment area with all-weather patio blinds
-Eight-person timber decked recovery spa & AIS endorsed heated training pool
-Natural light-filled home, plus beautiful lighting plan inside & out
-2 x double carports with sealed driveways & extensive shedding
-Established gardens & lawn plus a large veggie patch
-Rainwater storage with automatic watering system for gardens
-A few short minutes by car to school & Gateway Plaza shops
-10mins to Geelong CBD & 15mins to beach & cafes in Ocean Grove
The Owner Loves.
We were drawn to the convenience that this location offers, halfway between the lifestyle and amenities of both Ocean Grove and Geelong, & we enjoy absolute privacy with mature gardens and purpose-built entertaining areas. This is a perfect home for your family and its future, with space for the family to get away from it all, a place to unwind and be together.

Description:
Family Living In Sought After Location
Nestled amongst other quality homes in this highly sought after and convenient location you will find this stunning family home.
Upon entering this home, you will be surprised by the size, quality and what it has to offer
Overlooking the front garden, the spacious main bedroom creates a private oasis for parents. The walk-in robe is wonderfully spacious and the private en-suite. Three additional generous size bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the central, main bathroom and separate toilet.
The stylish kitchen with a large island bench has an abundance of cupboard space, 900mm gas cooktop, electric wall oven, pantry and dishwasher. A spacious open plan kitchen, meals, and living area with convenient sliding door access to the outdoor undercover alfresco area. This indoor-outdoor flow is ideal for everyday living and entertaining. All of this is located on a low maintenance allotment of 619m2 (approx).
Add extras include a double remote lock-up garage with internal access, secure side access perfect for storage of a caravan or boat, gas ducted heating throughout and evaporative cooling keeping you comfortable in all seasons.
With the Bellarine Peninsula at your doorstep, a 15-minute drive to Geelong CBD and access to some of the regions best beaches, you are spoilt for choice. Only 5 minutes to Gateway Plaza shopping Centre, local schools, kindergartens and sporting facilities.
This wonderful home is ideal for any family wanting to enjoy everything this ever-popular suburb has to offer or the perfect investment with proven growth. If you're looking for the perfect family home without compromising on lifestyle, then don't go past this fabulous single-level home.

Description:
Private Inspections Available
Mid-Century Masterpiece On Approx. 5 Acres!
Architecturally designed by one of Melbournes Multi Award-Winning architects, this family home is set upon approx. 5 acres. Exuding retro charm and with rustic gardens surrounding the home, this private and tranquil lifestyle is yours to keep!
Public transport is a short walk from your front door, while the conveniences of Leopold are only a short drive away. With easy access to kindergartens, Leopold P.S. and the Gateway Plaza, the elements are in place for practical family living. Lake Connewarre is moments away for leisurely outdoor activities, while the Bellarine Peninsula invites you to spend your weekends exploring the finest wineries and stunning coastline.
Architecturally designed by the owner, this home is truly one-of-a-kind. The façade makes a striking statement with broken bricks, while the entrance showcases the floating staircase. Handmade coloured glass captures the suns rays, while the interiors ooze character with Cedar panelling and raked ceilings with laminated timber beams.
The sunken lounge is graced with an open fireplace, while the family room creates a peaceful setting for the whole family to enjoy. The dining/kitchen zone opens onto the tranquil alfresco, which will entice you to sit back and relish your picturesque surroundings. The kitchen boasts a walk-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (double-drawer dishwasher, wall oven, electric cooktop). Three BRs with built-in robes (one with direct alfresco access), bathroom, shower room, powder room, and laundry with storage complete the downstairs level.
Upstairs, the Master Bedroom opens onto the balcony that overlooks the surrounding trees and gardens. A walk-in robe provides ample storage, while the en suite features a shower, single vanity, and toilet. The 5th bedroom or study could also be used as a nursery. Zoned concrete slab heating and a split-system air conditioner keep you comfortable in all seasons. The double carport and single lock-up garage provide parking. Other features of this property include a fernery, town water, and a sealed front road.
A blissful lifestyle awaits with this unique family home! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Vendor Says Sell!
Don't miss the opportunity to inspect this quality built home, situated close to schools, shopping, public transport and with easy access to the CBD.
Comprising three bedrooms (main with ensuite and WIR) plus study, open plan living, dining with polished floorboards and kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, caesar stone bench tops and butlers pantry. Also featuring a stunning central bathroom, second spacious living room at the front of the home, central heating and cooling, internal access from the double remote garage, a decked undercover entertaining area overlooking the low maintenance gardens and much more. If quality is important then this could be the one for you.

Description:
Retirement Awaits You!
Due to COVID-19 Regulations, Inspections are by appointment only. Wearing of masks and social distancing apply. Contact agent to organise a time.
This well priced and spacious 2 bedroom unit is situated in the Drysdale Retirement Village located in the heart of Drysdale and just a short stroll to all that this wonderful part of the world offers. Alternatively the bus stop is located for convenience at the front of the village. This unit was constructed 10 years ago and offers buyers open plan living with double doors leading to a sunny outdoor area. The kitchen is bright and modern. Both bedrooms are generously sized and have robes & ceiling fans. A separate carport takes care of the car accommodation. The lifestyle, companionship & security living here offers will make you wonder why you waited so long to make the move.
"Drysdale Retirement Village"
At Drysdale Retirement Village you'll find a way of life that allows you to do what you want, when you want, within the framework of security and care that residents enjoy. We believe retirement shouldn't be an end to active years.
On the contrary, it's a time to start living!
The Drysdale Retirement Village has been home to so many happy memories since 1984. We hope it will become your new home very soon.
Call or email to inspect this property.

Description:
Mid century Magic! As Neat as a Pin!
This home provides quality living and has been fastidiously maintained and perfectly presented. It is ready for its lucky new owner.
Well positioned with an easy walk to the beach and golf course. Situated in a quiet street and friendly neighbourhood.
Custom designed with mid-century themes, with all living spaces facing north to maximise natural light and the benefits of passive solar energy. Features a spacious lounge and formal dining area, a classically streamlined kitchen with plenty of bench space and garden outlook. Three good sized bedrooms with robes, master with ensuite. Plenty of storage space inside and out.
Outside you will find a generous workshop adjoining the double carport. The house is surrounded by beautiful, manicured gardens and features a sunny patio.
This house provides the perfect canvas for you to simply buy and put your feet up.

Description:
GREAT ENTERTAINER, VILLAGE LIFE STYLE AND SUPERB FAMILY HOME.
What a wonderful home to delight all astute buyers, extra space everywhere with room proportions and loads of car space, caravan /boat. Large inviting entrance, three living spaces as well as the outdoor alfresco area which becomes a room.....so well designed for all modes of living, liberal easy flow access from two areas to the outside entertaining space, built in BBQ, sinks and wood heater. The well designed kitchen creates a real family hub with adjacent dining, wide granite benches and the best of everything. The master bedroom has boxed windows, extra large ensuite and WIR., remaining three are at the rear of the home , all with BIR'S, central bathroom, powder room and separate toilet as well as laundry. Features include central heating, evaporative cooling, dble., glazed western windows, granite benches, 900m oven, pantry, dishwasher, quality window furnishings and fittings. Two lock up garages, one with tandem to rear yard to another stand alone area, boat port , so much to inspect and appreciate. Life will never be better than this on the Bellarine!

Description:
Serene and Tranquil Entertainers Paradise!
Combine a serene, rural setting, add a dash of character, with a mix of spacious family living and the result is this unique lifestyle property that is like nothing else available on the local market.
Sprawling across a 910m2 parcel and split over 2 levels, this home offers room for the whole family to enjoy and would make a perfect dual occupancy set up. The ground floor comprises an open plan living, dining and fully equipped kitchen with SS appliances and an abundance of storage options. The master retreat and ensuite is also situated on this level, complete with a spacious laundry, separate toilet, and versatile storeroom. Float upstairs and you're welcomed by a spacious 2nd living area and study nook, which offers sliding door access to an expansive alfresco. Bedroom 2 boasts its own private sitting area, with the remaining 3 bedrooms all offering sliding door access to the front balcony and a central family bathroom.
When it comes to outdoor entertaining options, take your pick! With an enviable Northern aspect, unwind and relax with the family in the manicured and private front garden, which is also equipped with an undercover area and an open deck. The back garden offers further options, with an open grassed space, paved area and access via external stairs to the top level alfresco.
Off street parking is no concern here, with dual cross overs and a 6x6m garage with rear access to the secure back garden on offer, perfect for multiple cars, trailers, boats and even the caravan!
A rare opportunity to secure your piece of paradise, with further scope to add your own touches, while being located only a stone's throw to all major amenities.

Description:
Conveniently Located Lifestyle Property
Secure yourself a semi-rural property, set on the outskirts of the thriving suburb of Leopold this parcel of land offers a true country lifestyle, offering privacy yet still extremely close by to all you every day needs. Set on approx. 5 acres the potential is immense. Whether you are looking to spruce up the existing house, renovate to your dream home or start again with space for a pool, horses, sprawling gardens and much more (STCA).
This neat brick veneer home offers various lifestyle opportunities for the growing family. From the moment you step inside you will feel a sense of comfort. The clever design offers practical every day and family living. Comprising generously proportioned rooms, including two separate living areas complete with timber feature walls, wood heater and a split system. The updated kitchen offers electric oven and hotplates, dishwasher, plus ample bench and cupboard space and overlooks the separate dining area.
Down the hallway are all four large bedrooms offering built-in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom complete with double vanity and bath. You will also find the study attached to the large lounge/ rumpus room which is ideal for a childrens playroom.
Outdoors will leave you wanting nothing more. Comprising a covered outdoor alfresco area which is perfect for sitting back and enjoying the peace and tranquility that surrounds you. There is ample room for the kids and pets to run around and enjoy. The grounds yield a number of paddocks, stables and shelters.
Vehicle accommodation is no issue offering a double carport, as well as a workshop and tool shed for the handy buyers.
Added features include; 3.4x5.5 shed and 5kW solar system.
Situated only moments from Gateway Plaza, public transport and playgrounds plus easy access to the bustling City of Geelong, plus popular beaches located on the Bellarine Peninsula and Surf Coast, you can enjoy the best of both worlds. If you are seeking a piece of a country lifestyle but with the convenience of everyday necessities that the city life provides, then this property is for you! Dont miss this exciting opportunity.

Description:
Live the Bellarine Life
This home is gracious and spacious with a touch of luxe and resort style living. Step into the wide welcoming hallway and you will instantly feel that there is a lot to get excited about here.
With a spa bath in the en-suite, and a super sized walk-in robe, the king size master invites you to relax and slow down. A second king sized bedroom, with a private sitting area and semi en-suite access, makes the ideal guest room. While a third bedroom is adjacent to a home office or reading nook.
The open plan living zone is a highlight; it features a generous kitchen with quality appliances and plentiful space to gather with family and friends. A fully enclosed outdoor room adds even more living space and is a favourite spot to enjoy outdoor entertaining all year round. A formal lounge provides a cosy space to unwind and there is ducted heating and evaporative cooling plus a split system to ensure comfort throughout.
The double garage includes a bonus workshop area, ideal for creative or handy types. Outdoors a compact, established garden requires little maintenance. Additional outdoor living on an under cover hardwood deck is the perfect spot for summer lunches and evening BBQs.
Conveniently located in a quiet court, it is a few minutes walk to the local primary school, shops, parks and sporting reserves. Be in Geelong in 20 minutes, or make the most of the central location to soak up Bellarine beaches, wineries and laid back living.

Description:
Family Delight
Look no further, for this well designed solid brick home with three bedrooms, one bathroom and a massive rumpus room sitting perfectly in the heart of Clifton Springs on a large 597sqm block.
Nestled behind large double colourbond gates sits this well maintained residence with a large double garage at the front and a separate undercover alfresco area at the back. There's plenty of space for all of your family and guests to have BBQs or just chill out.
Jump in the five person spa with a swim extension to unwind and relax after a hard day.
Enter into the large living area with views to the front manicured gardens and this room is kept comfortable with a split system, providing perfect heating and cooling.
The dining and kitchen are very roomy with plenty of natural light showcasing the polished timber floors that really lift this home. The modern kitchen with plenty of cupboard space has a .900mm gas cooktop and a wall oven, dishwasher and an island bench that will impress with its size.
The central bright bathroom with plenty of natural light has a large shower, bath and vanity
The bedrooms are very generous in size with built in robes, one bedroom is currently used as study / retreat.
This home has a massive rumpus room that has unlimited potential, possibly being a self contained unit or a games room and its size would allow large gatherings of family and friends. It's just another extra attraction to this fantastic home and it has its own cooling and heating with a split system.
This home is a must to inspect with its stand-out features that presents many benefits on such a great block.
Come live and play on the Bellarine.

Description:
Ideal First Home, Downsizer or Investment
If you have been looking for the perfect excuse NOT to build, then your wish has come true with this wonderful family home in highly sought-after Leopold! Only 4 years old, this delightfully presented single level brick home offers superior quality and functional design throughout. Comprising 3 Bedrooms, all with built in robes, master with full ensuite, including large shower. The other 2 bedrooms are serviced by a central family bathroom and separate toilet. The modern quality kitchen features an island bench, electric oven, gas stove top, dishwasher, large pantry and loads of storage. A clever floorplan offers a generous open plan dining and living zone. Outside you will find low maintenance front and back garden areas and a double remote garage with internal access. Other features include: ducted gas heating, split system heating & cooling to the kitchen/dining/living area, gas hot water service, and quality flooring throughout.
This home represents outstanding value set in a quiet street surrounded by quality homes and all of Leopolds great amenities including local schools, Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre, medical, cafes, local restaurants, transport, sporting facilities and 10 minutes from some of the Bellarines finest wineries, beaches and attractions. This is sure to be snapped up fast, dont miss your chance and call today for a private inspection.

Description:
Your own rural haven...
If you love a country atmosphere with the benefits of city living, here's the perfect hideaway. Only a 5 minute drive to Geelong CBD &10 minutes to coastal areas, the location of this hidden gem screams convenience whilst offering all the relaxing benefits of a rural retreat.
On a large allotment of 4,007sqm in a secluded cul de sac, this property offers a peaceful outlook of neighbouring farmland, minutes to Bellarine Village, local schools & public transport. This low maintenance home will leave you free to enjoy your downtime. Go practice your golf swing in the park or walk the kids to Splashdown for a swim.
This 6 y.o home is architecturally designed to enjoy the benefits of a northerly aspect & eco-friendly living, providing a 6 star energy rating. The external Linea weatherboards save painting in years to come & act as a great insulator, keeping the home warm in winter & cool in summer. The windows are double glazed, the positioning of the home allows plenty of natural light & the stylish allergy friendly bamboo flooring is ideal for easy maintenance. 5kW solar panels, solar hot water system & a 25,000 l rainwater tank keep energy & water bills to a minimum.
Comprising a wide entrance, sun drenched dining/living room plus a 2nd family/lounge area. The well appointed kitchen has plenty of storage space, a walk in pantry, stone benchtops, 2 Pac finish, glass splashback, gas cooktop, 1 ½ electric ovens & a dishwasher. There are 4 bdms, 3 have BIRs, the master has a WIR/ensuite. The central family bathroom has a separate bath & shower & separate toilet. Ducted vacuum throughout.
Outdoors is an impressive undercover area, ideal for enjoying the view of surrounding paddocks & farm animals & taking in this peaceful atmosphere.
The large allotment is a blank canvas, with plenty of room for the addition of more gardens, fruit trees or a pool. The huge shed is every tradies dream, measuring 7.5m x 17.5m, providing ample storage for extra cars, boat, trailer or a workshop. There is also a r/c DG with internal access to the home.
Opportunities like this are few & far between. Inspect & secure as your own, then sit back & enjoy the serenity of this beautiful rural setting.
All information is provided by third parties. You are advised to make your own enquiries regarding the accuracy of information relating to properties. Eastwood Andrews will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance to information supplied.
